person.persName: Amos Kendall Bradley (Hopkins County, Kentucky, attorney and prov govt conv mem)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, attorney and provisional government convention member. Kentucky native. Son of William Bradley and Catherine M. Bradley. Married to Laura Christy Bradley. Father of Ida Bradley, William Bradley, Garland Bradley, Charles Bradley, and John Bradley. Attorney in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Attorney in Hopkins County in 1860. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.
